changeSet.sql: create sequence campaign_investor_seq; create table if not exists campaign_investor ( id bigint not null constraint campaign_investor_pkey primary key, custom_profile_url varchar(255), description varchar(255), facebook_url varchar(255), invested_amount numeric(19,2), is_anonymous boolean, linkedin_url varchar(255), location varchar(255), name varchar(255), order_number int, photo_url varchar(255), twitter_url varchar(255), campaign_id bigint constraint campaign_investor_fk_on_campaign references campaign );
